en.footer_info: Earliest record time: **{first_record_time_str}**, latest record time: **{latest_record_time_str}**, index lines: **{latest_db_records}**, video storage: **{videos_file_size} GB** ({videos_files_count} video files)
en.footer_info_help: There may be a delay of up to two days in updating statistics.
en.oneday_toggle_search_help: Separate multiple keywords with spaces. Press Enter without entering any content to list all data in day.
en.oneday_search_md_none: âš  No results found
en.oneday_md_no_enough_thunmbnail_for_timel: Not enough thumbnails to generate timeline for the day.
en.oneday_text_not_found_vid_but_has_data: Video file for this time not found on disk, but text data nearby is available for retrieval.
en.oneday_text_data_indexing_wait_and_refre: Indexing data, please wait a few minutes and refresh.
en.oneday_text_no_found_record_and_vid_on_d: No video file or record found on disk for this time.
en.oneday_text_has_vid_but_not_index: No data index in the database for this day. However, there is a video on disk wait to be indexed.
en.oneday_text_vid_and_data_not_found: Data index and video file not found for this day.
en.oneday_text_flag_mark_help: When you want to add a mark to an important meeting, emergency situation, certain live broadcast, game or movie viewing highlight moment, etc. to facilitate future review, you can add a mark to the present moment through the tray menu.
en.oneday_text_help_locate_manually: Limited by streamlit capabilities, currently can only manually locate back to timestamp.
en.oneday_btn_add_flag_mark_from_select_tim: Add a mark on positioned time
en.oneday_wt_help: The statistics may have deviations and are for reference only.
en.oneday_ls_text_no_wintitle_stat: No activity data for the day
en.oneday_ls_text_no_wintitle_stat_momnth: No activity data for the month
en.oneday_ls_text_disable_leftside: Sidebar closed, enable in Settings.
en.gs_input_search_help: Separate multiple keywords with spaces. The window title can also be used as keyword.
en.gs_input_exclude_help: Leave blank for no exclusion. Multiple keywords can be separated by space.
en.gs_text_pls_choose_full_date_range: Please select a complete time range
en.gs_text_intro: This is the global search page where you can search all the recorded content to date. Press Enter to search after entering the keywords.
en.gs_input_img_emb_search: Use natural language to describe images
en.gs_text_img_emb_help: Use natural language to describe the content of the image. The more precise the description, the closer the result will found. Up to 21 languages such as Chinese, English, Japanese, and Korean are supported here (detailed uform document). The video needs to be embedded after indexing Only by searching, seeing the Setting description for details.
en.gs_text_upload_img_help: The embedding model tends to search based on the semantics of the image content rather than matching the characteristics of the image itself.
en.gs_text_not_install_img_emb: The Image Embedding module is not enabled or installed. Please go to the settings page to enable it. If there are no relevant options in the settings, please install the image semantic module first. The installation script could be found at the Windrecorder directory: extension\install_img_embedding_module\install_img_embedding_module.bat
en.stat_text_no_month_word_cloud_pic: No word cloud image for this month.
en.stat_text_no_month_lightbox: No lightbox image for this month.
en.stat_text_wintitle_filter_help: Separate multiple keywords by spaces to search. Case will be ignored when searching for keywords. Leave blank to list all data for the current month.
en.rs_text_need_to_restart_after_save_setti: After saving the settings on this page, you need to restart 'Windrecorder' to take effect.
en.rs_checkbox_start_record_when_startup_he: After applied, a shortcut will be created for 'start_app.bat' and placed in the system's startup directory. This behavior may be misjudged as a virus and cause 'start_webui.bat' to be removed by some security software, if any interception, please remove it from the isolation area and mark it as trusted software. Or manually create a shortcut for 'start_app.bat' and place it in the system's startup folder.
en.rs_input_stop_recording_when_screen_free: Skip recording the next video clip when screen has not changed for minutes (0 for never pause)
en.rs_text_skip_recording_by_wintitle: Skip recording the next video clip and index to database when the title of the current application or OCR text contain one of the following words:
en.rs_text_ocr_auto_update: Automatically index when the video clip is recorded (Recommended)
en.rs_selectbox_compress_ratio_help: 0.75 times scaling can compress the original video size to 1/4, 0.5 times to 1/8, 0.25 times to 1/16. Compression ratio may vary depending on the video's specific content.
en.rs_checkbox_enable_half_res_while_hidpi: For 'high DPI/high resolution screens', scale to quarter resolution when recording
en.rs_text_compress_CRF_help: CRF is the abbreviation of Constant Rate Factor, which is used to set the quality and bit rate control of video encoding. Windrecorder is set to 39 by default for a higher compression rate. In ffmpeg, the value range of CRF depends on The encoder used. For x264 encoders, the CRF value range is 0 to 51, where 0 means lossless, 23 is the default value, and 51 means the worst quality. Lower values mean higher quality, but Will result in a larger file size. Typically, the reasonable value range for x264 encoders is 18 to 28. For x265 encoders, the default CRF value is 28. For libvpx encoders, the CRF value range is 0 to 63. In general, the lower the CRF value, the higher the video quality, but the file size will increase accordingly.
en.rs_text_estimate_hint: Estimated video size recorded every 15 minutes: {min}Mb ~ {max}Mb, depending on the specific recording content and the number of displays.
en.rs_text_encode_benchmark_loading: Testing, it will take about 1 minute...
en.rs_text_compress_ratio_help: Compression ratio = compressed video file size/original video file size. The provided test video file is short, and there may be a large deviation in the presentation of this indicator. As the video time increases, the compression rate will be relatively higher .You can replace the __assets__\test_video_compress.mp4 file for testing.
en.rs_text_record_help: Choose h265/AV1 to get better image quality in the same file size, but the performance may be affected during recording and playback. (If supported, hardware acceleration will be automatically enabled)
en.rs_text_bitrate_help: Video bitrate refers to the transmission speed or processing speed of video data, which will affect the video quality and file size. Specifically, the higher the bitrate, the better the video quality, but the corresponding file The size will also be larger. On the contrary, if the bit rate is lower, the video quality may be blurred or distorted even at the same resolution. In order to keep the picture size smaller, the default is 200kbps.
en.rs_text_hevc_tips: To playback HEVC (h265) videos on Microsoft Edge / Firefox, you may need to install the HEVC video extension: https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9NMZLZ57R3T7
en.set_selectbox_local_ocr_engine_help: It is recommended to use Windows built-in Windows.Media.Ocr.Cli for OCR, which is faster and consumes less resources.
en.set_md_ocr_ignore_area: **OCR area to ignore on the display edges**
en.set_md_ocr_ignore_area_help: Enter number as percentage, i.e., '6' == 6%. This option allows to ignore elements at the edges of the screen during OCR, such as browser tabs, Windows Start Menu, in-page advertisements, etc.
en.set_help_enable_3_columns_in_oneday: The three-column layout is suitable for larger webui display devices and can provide more information and center the traceback screen. The default two-column layout is suitable for smaller webui display devices.
en.set_checkbox_use_similar_zh_char_to_sear: Use Chinese similar characters for searching
OCR may misrecognize similar characters, enabling this option will search for similar shapes simultaneously to the keyword, improving the hit rate of the results.
en.set_input_wordcloud_filter: Filter the following words in the word cloud generation:
en.set_input_wordcloud_filter_help: Some UI keywords may persistently appear, resulting in higher frequency in the data. Here, you can exclude them from the word cloud's statistics.
en.set_input_oneday_timeline_thumbnail_num_: If you want the thumbnail density in Daily timelines to be higher, you can increase this value.
en.set_text_video_not_index: There are {nocred_count} videos waiting to be indexed. Expected time: <{timeCostStr}>. (There are {count} files on disk.)
en.set_text_no_video_need_index: No new videos need indexing at the moment.  (There are {count} files on disk.)
en.set_text_one_video_to_index: 1 video is being recorded, no new videos need indexing at the moment.  (There are {count} files on disk.)
en.set_text_some_video_will_be_index: There are {nocred_count} videos that will be indexed automatically. (There are {count} files on disk.)
en.set_text_updating_db: Updating database, please do not operate or refresh the page. Estimated time required: {estimate_time_str}
en.set_input_max_num_search_page: In global search, maximum number of results per page
en.set_update_new: ğŸ’« A new version {tool_version} has been detected. Update by opening `install_update.bat` or tray menu.
en.set_pwd_text: webui access password (leave blank to disable)
en.set_pwd_help: If password input filled, you will be asked to provide a password when accessing webui. This setting will not encrypt your data, but only protects the entrance to webui to avoid access by unfamiliar users in the same LAN.
en.set_pwd_forget_help: Forgot your password? Delete the webui_access_password_md5 item in config_user.json to reset password.
en.set_text_enable_img_emb_help: Image semantic retrieval is a method of image retrieval based on the semantic content of images through computer vision technology. It can retrieve queries from large-scale image databases based on the semantic description of the content of the image. Related images. Windrecorder uses uform3-image-text-multilingual-base to embed the index. When this option turned on, the app will embedding image from video in idle maintain, and then it can be searched. You can also embedding manually through the script under app directory 'extension/index_img_embedding_for_all_videofiles'.
en.set_text_img_emb_not_suppport_cuda: Your device seems not support CUDA, may have lower performance when using CPU to embedding images.
en.set_input_img_emb_max_recall_count: Maximum number of results recalled from each database in Image semantic search
en.set_text_help_img_emb_max_recall_count: A specified number of results will be recalled from each month database. Too high or too low may lead to a decrease in query accuracy. If the results are inaccurate, try adjusting this option.
en.set_help_day_begin_minutes: You can divide the records for a period of time after midnight into the same natural day, instead of dividing each day by zero.
en.set_help_synonyms_recommand: If the language is not supported, it will not be enabled. Check the supported languages under config_src\synonyms.
en.set_checkbox_reduce_same_content_at_diff: When the same content is shown at different time points in a video slice, only the first occurrence is recorded.
en.qs_la_text_same_as_previous: The interface language remains the same as before: English
en.qs_un_set_your_username: Set your username as a database identifier.
en.qs_un_describe: Press enter to use the current username: [{sys_username}], or type a custom username (up to 20 characters).
en.qs_un_longer_than_expect: Exceeded the length limit (20 half-width English characters / 10 full-width Chinese characters).
en.qs_olang_intro: The system has the following languages installed. Select one as the main language for OCR detection:
en.qs_olang_ocrlang_set_to: The main language for OCR detection has been set to:
en.qs_olang_error: The input should be numeric and within the range of options.
en.qs_olang_one_choice_default_set:
The system language is {os_support_lang}, which has been applied as the main language for OCR detection.
(Not the language you want? Please check whether the input method/language pack of the selected language is installed on the system.
(https: //learn.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.media.ocr)
en.qs_ocr_result_describe: Accuracy: {accuracy}, Recognition Time: {timecost}, Time Required to Index a 15-minute Video: {timecost_15}
en.qs_ocr_describe: > It is recommended to use the built-in Windows.Media.Ocr.Cli, which has faster speed and lower performance consumption.
en.qs_ocr_describe_disable_clo:
> chineseocr_lite_onnx has been disabled due to compatibility issues. 
(Enabled by modifying 'enable_ocr_chineseocr_lite_onnx':true in user_config.json.)
en.qs_ocr_tips_low_accuracy:
! Accuracy too low? Please check whether the input method/language pack for the selected language is installed on your system. 
(https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.media.ocr)
In addition, the test case may not be accurate, please refer to the actual situation.
en.qs_ocr_cta: Please select the OCR engine for extracting screen content:
en.qs_ocr_not_has_lang_test_support: No suitable test case was found for the currently selected language and will be tested on en-US image. Don't worry, the OCR can still work correctly to recognize your language, just the wizard lacks appropriate testing, so the recognition rate may not reflect the actual situation.
en.qs_mo_describe_all: Multiple displays have been detected. Choose recording mode: (Press enter to apply the current option directly)
en.qs_mo_describe_single:
Single display ({width}x{height}) detected.

If you use multiple displays in the future, you can always adjust the multi-screen recording mode in the recording settings.
en.qs_mo_option_single: Only record one of the displays
en.qs_mo_set_to: The recording mode is set to:
en.qs_mo_choose_one_display: Please select a single display you want to record:
en.qs_mo_cta: The display's resolution will be automatically recognized each time the screen is recorded, no additional settings are required.
en.qs_et_describe: Windrecorder also provides some extension functions, which you can later install/use in the extension directory.
en.qs_end_describe:
Congratulations! You have completed all initial settings. Don't worry, you can adjust the settings anytime in the app! 

Now, you can open [start_app.bat] in the directory to start using it.
en.qs_end_slogan: > Capture and preserve the fleeting moments of the wind, as seen through your eyes.
en.qs_end_feedback: > Encountered a problem or have suggestions? Feel free to submit issues and PRs at https://github.com/yuka-friends/Windrecorder.
en.tray_notify_text: Use the right-click menu on tray to Pause Recording or Rewind Memories
en.tray_notify_text_start_without_record: Use the right-click menu on tray to Start Recording or Rewind Memories
en.tray_text_already_run: Another Windrecorder is running in system tray.

ja.gs_text_not_install_img_emb: ã‚¤ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¸ ã‚»ãƒãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒƒã‚¯å–å¾—ãƒ¢ã‚¸ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒæœ‰åŠ¹ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ãªã„ã€ã¾ãŸã¯ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚è¨­å®šãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ç§»å‹•ã—ã¦æœ‰åŠ¹ã«ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚è¨­å®šã«é–¢é€£ã™ã‚‹ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãŒãªã„å ´åˆã¯ã€æœ€åˆã«ã‚¤ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¸ ã‚»ãƒãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒƒã‚¯ ãƒ¢ã‚¸ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ« ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã¯æ¬¡ã®å ´æ‰€ã«ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ Windrecorder ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒª: extension\install_img_embedding_module\install_img_embedding_module.bat
ja.rs_text_compress_CRF_help: CRF ã¯ Constant Rate Factor ã®ç•¥ã§ã€ãƒ“ãƒ‡ã‚ª ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ã®å“è³ªã¨ãƒ“ãƒƒãƒˆ ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆåˆ¶å¾¡ã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ä½¿ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚Windrecorder ã¯åœ§ç¸®ç‡ã‚’é«˜ã‚ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã§ 39 ã«è¨­å®šã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ffmpeg ã§ã¯ã€CRF ã®å€¤ã®ç¯„å›²ã¯ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ€ã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦ç•°ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚x264 ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ€ã®å ´åˆã€CRF å€¤ã®ç¯„å›²ã¯ 0 ï½ 51 ã§ã™ã€‚0 ã¯ãƒ­ã‚¹ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‚’æ„å‘³ã—ã€23 ã¯ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆå€¤ã€51 ã¯æœ€æ‚ªã®å“è³ªã‚’æ„å‘³ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚å€¤ãŒä½ã„ã»ã©é«˜å“è³ªã‚’æ„å‘³ã—ã¾ã™ãŒã€çµæœã¯ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ« ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºãŒå¤§ãããªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚é€šå¸¸ã€x264 ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ€ã®é©åˆ‡ãªå€¤ã®ç¯„å›²ã¯ 18 ï½ 28 ã§ã™ã€‚x265 ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ€ã®å ´åˆã€ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã® CRF å€¤ã¯ 28 ã§ã™ã€‚libvpx ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ€ã®å ´åˆã€CRF å€¤ã®ç¯„å›²ã¯ 0 ï½ 63 ã§ã™ã€‚ä¸€èˆ¬ã«ã€CRF å€¤ãŒå°ã•ã„ã»ã©ã€ ã€ãƒ“ãƒ‡ã‚ªå“è³ªã¯é«˜ããªã‚Šã¾ã™ãŒã€ãã‚Œã«å¿œã˜ã¦ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ« ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºã‚‚å¤§ãããªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

ru.footer_info: Ğ¡Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞµ Ğ²Ñ€ĞµĞ¼Ñ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ¸: **{first_record_time_str}**, Ğ¡Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ğ½ĞµĞµ Ğ²Ñ€ĞµĞ¼Ñ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ¸: **{latest_record_time_str}**, Ğ˜Ğ½Ğ´ĞµĞºÑĞ½Ñ‹Ğµ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ¸: **{latest_db_records}**, Ğ Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµÑ€: **{videos_file_size} Ğ“Ğ‘** ({videos_files_count} Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ¾ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ»(Ğ°))
ru.footer_info_help: ĞœĞ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶ĞºĞ° Ğ´Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ²ÑƒÑ… Ğ´Ğ½ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸.
ru.oneday_toggle_search_help: Separate multiple keywords with spaces. Press Enter without entering any content to list all data in day.
ru.oneday_search_md_none: âš  No results found
ru.oneday_md_no_enough_thunmbnail_for_timel: Not enough thumbnails to generate timeline for the day.
ru.oneday_text_not_found_vid_but_has_data: Video file for this time not found on disk, but text data nearby is available for retrieval.
ru.oneday_text_data_indexing_wait_and_refre: Indexing data, please wait a few minutes and refresh.
ru.oneday_text_no_found_record_and_vid_on_d: No video file or record found on disk for this time.
ru.oneday_text_has_vid_but_not_index: No data index in the database for this day. However, there is a video on disk wait to be indexed.
ru.oneday_text_vid_and_data_not_found: Data index and video file not found for this day.
ru.oneday_text_flag_mark_help: When you want to add a mark to an important meeting, emergency situation, certain live broadcast, game or movie viewing highlight moment, etc. to facilitate future review, you can add a mark to the present moment through the tray menu.
ru.oneday_text_help_locate_manually: Limited by streamlit capabilities, currently can only manually locate back to timestamp.
ru.oneday_btn_add_flag_mark_from_select_tim: Add a mark on positioned time
ru.oneday_wt_help: The statistics may have deviations and are for reference only.
ru.oneday_ls_text_no_wintitle_stat: No activity data for the day
ru.oneday_ls_text_no_wintitle_stat_momnth: No activity data for the month
ru.oneday_ls_text_disable_leftside: Sidebar closed, enable in Settings.
ru.gs_input_search_help: Separate multiple keywords with spaces. The window title can also be used as keyword.
ru.gs_input_exclude_help: Leave blank for no exclusion. Multiple keywords can be separated by space.
ru.gs_text_pls_choose_full_date_range: Please select a complete time range
ru.gs_text_intro: This is the global search page where you can search all the recorded content to date. Press Enter to search after entering the keywords.
ru.gs_input_img_emb_search: Use natural language to describe images
ru.gs_text_img_emb_help: Use natural language to describe the content of the image. The more precise the description, the closer the result will found. Up to 21 languages such as Chinese, English, Japanese, and Korean are supported here (detailed uform document). The video needs to be embedded after indexing Only by searching, seeing the Setting description for details.
ru.gs_text_upload_img_help: The embedding model tends to search based on the semantics of the image content rather than matching the characteristics of the image itself.
ru.gs_text_not_install_img_emb: The Image Embedding module is not enabled or installed. Please go to the settings page to enable it. If there are no relevant options in the settings, please install the image semantic module first. The installation script could be found at the Windrecorder directory: extension\install_img_embedding_module\install_img_embedding_module.bat
ru.stat_text_no_month_word_cloud_pic: No word cloud image for this month.
ru.stat_text_no_month_lightbox: No lightbox image for this month.
ru.stat_text_wintitle_filter_help: Separate multiple keywords by spaces to search. Case will be ignored when searching for keywords. Leave blank to list all data for the current month.
ru.rs_text_need_to_restart_after_save_setti: After saving the settings on this page, you need to restart 'Windrecorder' to take effect.
ru.rs_checkbox_start_record_when_startup_he: After applied, a shortcut will be created for 'start_app.bat' and placed in the system's startup directory. This behavior may be misjudged as a virus and cause 'start_webui.bat' to be removed by some security software, if any interception, please remove it from the isolation area and mark it as trusted software. Or manually create a shortcut for 'start_app.bat' and place it in the system's startup folder.
ru.rs_input_stop_recording_when_screen_free: Skip recording the next video clip when screen has not changed for minutes (0 for never pause)
ru.rs_text_skip_recording_by_wintitle: Skip recording the next video clip and index to database when the title of the current application or OCR text contain one of the following words:
ru.rs_text_ocr_auto_update: Automatically index when the video clip is recorded (Recommended)
ru.rs_selectbox_compress_ratio_help: 0.75 times scaling can compress the original video size to 1/4, 0.5 times to 1/8, 0.25 times to 1/16. Compression ratio may vary depending on the video's specific content.
ru.rs_checkbox_enable_half_res_while_hidpi: For 'high DPI/high resolution screens', scale to quarter resolution when recording
ru.rs_text_compress_CRF_help: CRF is the abbreviation of Constant Rate Factor, which is used to set the quality and bit rate control of video encoding. Windrecorder is set to 39 by default for a higher compression rate. In ffmpeg, the value range of CRF depends on The encoder used. For x264 encoders, the CRF value range is 0 to 51, where 0 means lossless, 23 is the default value, and 51 means the worst quality. Lower values mean higher quality, but Will result in a larger file size. Typically, the reasonable value range for x264 encoders is 18 to 28. For x265 encoders, the default CRF value is 28. For libvpx encoders, the CRF value range is 0 to 63. In general, the lower the CRF value, the higher the video quality, but the file size will increase accordingly.
ru.rs_text_estimate_hint: Estimated video size recorded every 15 minutes: {min}Mb ~ {max}Mb, depending on the specific recording content and the number of displays.
ru.rs_text_encode_benchmark_loading: Testing, it will take about 1 minute...
ru.rs_text_compress_ratio_help: Compression ratio = compressed video file size/original video file size. The provided test video file is short, and there may be a large deviation in the presentation of this indicator. As the video time increases, the compression rate will be relatively higher .You can replace the __assets__\test_video_compress.mp4 file for testing.
ru.rs_text_record_help: Choose h265/AV1 to get better image quality in the same file size, but the performance may be affected during recording and playback. (If supported, hardware acceleration will be automatically enabled)
ru.rs_text_bitrate_help: Video bitrate refers to the transmission speed or processing speed of video data, which will affect the video quality and file size. Specifically, the higher the bitrate, the better the video quality, but the corresponding file The size will also be larger. On the contrary, if the bit rate is lower, the video quality may be blurred or distorted even at the same resolution. In order to keep the picture size smaller, the default is 200kbps.
ru.rs_text_hevc_tips: To playback HEVC (h265) videos on Microsoft Edge / Firefox, you may need to install the HEVC video extension: https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9NMZLZ57R3T7
ru.set_selectbox_local_ocr_engine_help: It is recommended to use Windows built-in Windows.Media.Ocr.Cli for OCR, which is faster and consumes less resources.
ru.set_md_ocr_ignore_area: **OCR area to ignore on the display edges**
ru.set_md_ocr_ignore_area_help: Enter number as percentage, i.e., '6' == 6%. This option allows to ignore elements at the edges of the screen during OCR, such as browser tabs, Windows Start Menu, in-page advertisements, etc.
ru.set_help_enable_3_columns_in_oneday: The three-column layout is suitable for larger webui display devices and can provide more information and center the traceback screen. The default two-column layout is suitable for smaller webui display devices.
ru.set_checkbox_use_similar_zh_char_to_sear: Use Chinese similar characters for searching
OCR may misrecognize similar characters, enabling this option will search for similar shapes simultaneously to the keyword, improving the hit rate of the results.
ru.set_input_wordcloud_filter: Filter the following words in the word cloud generation:
ru.set_input_wordcloud_filter_help: Some UI keywords may persistently appear, resulting in higher frequency in the data. Here, you can exclude them from the word cloud's statistics.
ru.set_input_oneday_timeline_thumbnail_num_: If you want the thumbnail density in Daily timelines to be higher, you can increase this value.
ru.set_text_video_not_index: There are {nocred_count} videos waiting to be indexed. Expected time: <{timeCostStr}>. (There are {count} files on disk.)
ru.set_text_no_video_need_index: No new videos need indexing at the moment.  (There are {count} files on disk.)
ru.set_text_one_video_to_index: 1 video is being recorded, no new videos need indexing at the moment.  (There are {count} files on disk.)
ru.set_text_some_video_will_be_index: There are {nocred_count} videos that will be indexed automatically. (There are {count} files on disk.)
ru.set_text_updating_db: Updating database, please do not operate or refresh the page. Estimated time required: {estimate_time_str}
ru.set_input_max_num_search_page: In global search, maximum number of results per page
ru.set_update_new: ğŸ’« A new version {tool_version} has been detected. Update by opening `install_update.bat` or tray menu.
ru.set_pwd_text: webui access password (leave blank to disable)
ru.set_pwd_help: If password input filled, you will be asked to provide a password when accessing webui. This setting will not encrypt your data, but only protects the entrance to webui to avoid access by unfamiliar users in the same LAN.
ru.set_pwd_forget_help: Forgot your password? Delete the webui_access_password_md5 item in config_user.json to reset password.
ru.set_text_enable_img_emb_help: Image semantic retrieval is a method of image retrieval based on the semantic content of images through computer vision technology. It can retrieve queries from large-scale image databases based on the semantic description of the content of the image. Related images. Windrecorder uses uform3-image-text-multilingual-base to embed the index. When this option turned on, the app will embedding image from video in idle maintain, and then it can be searched. You can also embedding manually through the script under app directory 'extension/index_img_embedding_for_all_videofiles'.
ru.set_text_img_emb_not_suppport_cuda: Your device seems not support CUDA, may have lower performance when using CPU to embedding images.
ru.set_input_img_emb_max_recall_count: Maximum number of results recalled from each database in Image semantic search
ru.set_text_help_img_emb_max_recall_count: A specified number of results will be recalled from each month database. Too high or too low may lead to a decrease in query accuracy. If the results are inaccurate, try adjusting this option.
ru.set_help_day_begin_minutes: You can divide the records for a period of time after midnight into the same natural day, instead of dividing each day by zero.
ru.set_help_synonyms_recommand: If the language is not supported, it will not be enabled. Check the supported languages under config_src\synonyms.
ru.set_checkbox_reduce_same_content_at_diff: When the same content is shown at different time points in a video slice, only the first occurrence is recorded.
ru.qs_la_text_same_as_previous: The interface language remains the same as before: English
ru.qs_un_set_your_username: Set your username as a database identifier.
ru.qs_un_describe: Press enter to use the current username: [{sys_username}], or type a custom username (up to 20 characters).
ru.qs_un_longer_than_expect: Exceeded the length limit (20 half-width English characters / 10 full-width Chinese characters).
ru.qs_olang_intro: The system has the following languages installed. Select one as the main language for OCR detection:
ru.qs_olang_ocrlang_set_to: The main language for OCR detection has been set to:
ru.qs_olang_error: The input should be numeric and within the range of options.
ru.qs_olang_one_choice_default_set:
The system language is {os_support_lang}, which has been applied as the main language for OCR detection.
(Not the language you want? Please check whether the input method/language pack of the selected language is installed on the system.
(https: //learn.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.media.ocr)
ru.qs_ocr_result_describe: Accuracy: {accuracy}, Recognition Time: {timecost}, Time Required to Index a 15-minute Video: {timecost_15}
ru.qs_ocr_describe: > It is recommended to use the built-in Windows.Media.Ocr.Cli, which has faster speed and lower performance consumption.
ru.qs_ocr_describe_disable_clo:
> chineseocr_lite_onnx has been disabled due to compatibility issues. 
(Enabled by modifying 'enable_ocr_chineseocr_lite_onnx':true in user_config.json.)
ru.qs_ocr_tips_low_accuracy:
! Accuracy too low? Please check whether the input method/language pack for the selected language is installed on your system. 
(https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.media.ocr)
In addition, the test case may not be accurate, please refer to the actual situation.
ru.qs_ocr_cta: Please select the OCR engine for extracting screen content:
ru.qs_ocr_not_has_lang_test_support: No suitable test case was found for the currently selected language and will be tested on en-US image. Don't worry, the OCR can still work correctly to recognize your language, just the wizard lacks appropriate testing, so the recognition rate may not reflect the actual situation.
ru.qs_mo_describe_all: Multiple displays have been detected. Choose recording mode: (Press enter to apply the current option directly)
ru.qs_mo_describe_single:
Single display ({width}x{height}) detected.

If you use multiple displays in the future, you can always adjust the multi-screen recording mode in the recording settings.
ru.qs_mo_option_single: Only record one of the displays
ru.qs_mo_set_to: The recording mode is set to:
ru.qs_mo_choose_one_display: Please select a single display you want to record:
ru.qs_mo_cta: The display's resolution will be automatically recognized each time the screen is recorded, no additional settings are required.
ru.qs_et_describe: Windrecorder also provides some extension functions, which you can later install/use in the extension directory.
ru.qs_end_describe:
Congratulations! You have completed all initial settings. Don't worry, you can adjust the settings anytime in the app! 

Now, you can open [start_app.bat] in the directory to start using it.
ru.qs_end_slogan: > Capture and preserve the fleeting moments of the wind, as seen through your eyes.
ru.qs_end_feedback: > Encountered a problem or have suggestions? Feel free to submit issues and PRs at https://github.com/yuka-friends/Windrecorder.
ru.tray_notify_text: Use the right-click menu on tray to Pause Recording or Rewind Memories
ru.tray_notify_text_start_without_record: Use the right-click menu on tray to Start Recording or Rewind Memories
ru.tray_text_already_run: Another Windrecorder is running in system tray.
